code: import React from"react";import skillsdata from"../data/skillsdata.json";import experience from"../data/experience.json";import{getImg}from"../../utils.js";import"../Skills/skills.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Skills=()=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"stitle",children:"Skills & Experience"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{className:"scontainer",id:"sexperience",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"scontent",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"sskills",children:skillsdata.map((skill,id)=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"sskill",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"sskillImageContainer",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:getImg(skill.title),alt:skill.title})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:skill.title})]},id);})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"shistory",children:experience.map((experienceItem,id)=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:"sexperienceItem",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:getImg(experienceItem.title),alt:"".concat(experienceItem.title," Logo")}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"sexperienceItemDetails",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"".concat(experienceItem.role,",")})," ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"".concat(experienceItem.organisation)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"".concat(experienceItem.startDate," - ").concat(experienceItem.endDate)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:experienceItem.experiences.map((experience,id)=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:experience},id);})})]})]},id);})})]})})]});};export default Skills;
